content: if you love making granny squares you will enjoy this fun retro crochet scarf i used lots of colour in my version but if you prefer you could make this scarf in a single colour which would be beautiful this easy crochet pattern consists of 14 granny squares attached together and a fun border added each side you can use any worsted weight/aran yarn to achieve a similar effect **measurements** 75 x 12 191cm x 30cm excluding fringe
